author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-‍Paragon Offshore Comments On Dismissal Of Chapter 11 Cases
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - Paragon Offshore:
* ‍PARAGON OFFSHORE LIMITED COMMENTS ON DISMISSAL OF CHAPTER 11 CASES RELATED TO PROSPECTOR OFFSHORE​
* PARAGON OFFSHORE DRILLING -‍ON MARCH 27 CONDITIONS PRECEDENT FOR CLOSING SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT WERE SATISFIED BY ALL PARTIES
* PARAGON OFFSHORE DRILLING AS -‍FURTHERMORE, COURT APPROVED AN ORDER DISMISSING CHAPTER 11 CASES EFFECTIVE TODAY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
